item.title: Patrick Oancia New and ready
item.description:
Patrick Oancia New and ready

TypographyVerse is the system that automates how The Grid chooses fonts for your site. Rather than picking individual typefaces for your headers, sub-headers, and body text, you can use the type slider to choose the feeling you're going for, and let The Grid do the rest.TypographyVerse is the system that automates how The Grid chooses fonts for your site. Rather than picking individual typefaces for your headers, sub-headers, and body text, you can use the type slider to choose the feeling you're going for, and let The Grid do the rest.
